sqlMap.select: select tuser.username, tperson.first_name, tperson.last_name, trole.name as role_name, trole.key as role_key, tuser.user_id from tbl_user as tuser left outer join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id left outer join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id left outer join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id order by tuser.user_id desc

select distinct tuser.user_id as user_id_distinct from tbl_user as tuser left outer join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id left outer join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id left outer join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id where (tuser.username ilike #value# or tperson.first_name ilike #value# or tperson.last_name ilike #value#) and trole.user_role_id = #number# order by tuser.user_id desc

select tuser.username, tperson.first_name, tperson.last_name, trole.name as role_name, trole.key as role_key, tuser.user_id from tbl_user as tuser left outer join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id left outer join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id left outer join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id where (tuser.username ilike #value# or tperson.first_name ilike #value# or tperson.last_name ilike #value#) and tuser.user_id <= #fromId# and tuser.user_id >= #toId# and trole.user_role_id = #number# order by tuser.user_id desc
